hooks.command: powershell -Command "$file = $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; if ($file -match '\.ts$') { npx prettier --write $file --log-level=silent 2>$null; npx eslint --fix $file --max-warnings=0 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 10 } elseif ($file -match '\.json$') { npx prettier --write $file --log-level=silent 2>$null } elseif ($file -match '\.py$') { python -m black $file --quiet 2>$null; python -m ruff check $file --fix --quiet 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 10 }"
